plot: A woman running a small dress-making business is suddenly forced to support her family with her meager earnings when her ex-boyfriend sends her husband's company into bankruptcy.
title: Pamun
plot_es: A woman running a small dress-making business is suddenly forced to support her family with her meager earnings when her ex-boyfriend sends her husband's company into bankruptcy.
plot_en: A woman running a small dress-making business is suddenly forced to support her family with her meager earnings when her ex-boyfriend sends her husband's company into bankruptcy.
